title: PFC secures largest-ever foreign currency term loan of $1.265 bn
description: State-owned Power Finance Corporation (PFC) has secured the largest-ever foreign currency term loan of USD 1.265 billion from banks in IFSC GIFT City, Gandhinagar. The loan, at an average rate of 4.21% per annum, will be used to finance non-thermal generation projects, promoting green energy transition.
